sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Fire Sprinkler Dormitory Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Fire Sprinkler Dormitory Act.

sections.heading: Definition. "Post-secondary educational institution" means an Illinois public or private college or university offering degrees and instruction above the high school level
sections.text: This term does not include any public or private college or university that does not provide on-campus housing for its student

sections.heading: Fire sprinkler systems required
sections.text: Subject to the establishment of a fire sprinkler dormitory revolving loan program under Section 15 of this Act, fire sprinkler systems are required in the dormitories of all post-secondary educational institutions by 2013, unless a post-secondary educational institut

sections.heading: Fire Sprinkler Dormitory Revolving Loan Program
sections.text: The Illinois Finance Authority and the Office of the State Fire Marshal shall jointly administer a fire sprinkler dormitory revolving loan program. The program shall provide low-interest loans for the installation of fire sprinkler systems in college

sections.heading: Rules. The Illinois Finance Authority and the Office of the State Fire Marshal shall adopt rules to administer the revolving loan program.
sections.text: Rules. The Illinois Finance Authority and the Office of the State Fire Marshal shall adopt rules to administer the revolving loan program.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2005.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2005.
